publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-562 Pauline McNeill on behalf of the Justice 1 Committee: Former Justice 1 Committee's 3rd Report 2003 (Session 1): Inquiry into Alternatives to Custody (SP Paper 826)-That the Parliament notes the 3rd Report 2003 (Session 1) of the former Justice 1 Committee, Inquiry into Alternatives to Custody. Supported by: Mr Stewart Maxwell*

S2M-562 Pauline McNeill on behalf of the Justice 1 Committee: Former Justice 1 Committee's 3rd Report 2003 (Session 1): Inquiry into Alternatives to Custody-That the Parliament notes the 3rd Report 2003 (Session 1) of the former Justice 1 Committee, Inquiry into Alternatives to Custody (SP Paper 826).
